markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">
[Wind Jump](/Spells.aspx?ID=2065)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=527" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 257 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed. You must end your turn on solid ground, or you fall.

---
**Heightened (6th)** At the end of your turn, you can attempt a DC 30 [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) check to find purchase in midair. If you succeed, you don't fall.
name: Wind Jump

text: Wind Jump Single Action Source Player Core 2 pg. 257 1.1 Duration 1 minute --- You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed. You must end your turn on solid ground, or you fall. --- Heightened (6th) At the end of your turn, you can attempt a DC 30 Acrobatics check to find purchase in midair. If you succeed, you don't fall.
